sentence: President, elections are the bedrock of our American  democracy, and despite what the President and his big circle of  election-denying, conspiracy theorists would have Americans believe,  the truth is that our elections are, indeed, free; that our elections  are, indeed, fair; and that our elections are, indeed, secure.

My colleagues  on the other side of the aisle seem to think that who got them elected,  who they serve, that the only people who matter are not the 730,000  constituents that they have but Donald Trump, Stephen Miller, and Elon  Musk, as long as he and Donald Trump are getting along and paying for  elections.
